name: Nymphomanic Empire
startIntroPart1: Lay down your weapons and spread your legs!
startIntroPart2: Submit to our rule, and we'll submit in your beds.
declaringWar: Time to join the fold, make this easy and don't be a brat.
attacked: You want to play? Very funny!
defeated: No! No! This can't be, you've made a grave mistake.
introduction: Bow down and beg for mercy.
afterPeace: Perfect, prepare for the next war, we will be back stronger.
tradeRequest: We have this trade offer for you.
uniques: City-State Influence recovers at twice the normal rate
City-State territory always counts as friendly territory
